item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-12-19
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Orinoco (22 Harvard St., Webster Pl., Brookline). #
  • I'm at AMC Theatres - Chestnut Hill 6 (27 Boylston Street, Chestnut Hill). #
  • Watching Avatar in 3D! — at AMC Theaters Chestnut Hill 6 #
  • Just out of Avatar. Although it's a mix of familar stories, all involved should be proud. It's quite an achievement. #
  • I'm at Aquitaine Bis (11 Boylston St, Chestnut Hill). #
  • Potato Latkes #
  • Sonoma on a pillow #

Powered by Twitter Tools
